channel.title: Maps on Biased
channel.description: Recent content in Maps on Biased

item.title: #tidytuesday: Exploring (missing) data with maps
item.description: This week’s #tidytuesday data is the incarceration trends data set from the Vera Institute of Justice, which contains county-level jail data (1970-2015) and prison data (1983-2015). Vera is a non-profit research and policy organisation focusing on “the causes and consequences of mass incarceration, racial disparities, and the loss of public trust in law enforcement” (see the Wikipedia article for more). I’ve been thinking about exploring maps in R but never gotten around to it, so this seemed like a great opportunity.
